title: Moving Friend Groups around
body:
So when you create groups for your mates I have an issue. At first I can arrange them as I want, but when i relog the order is changed (it is not even alphabetical and I cant see any logical order) and I can no longer move the groups up or down in the list. Please look into this bug!

Gekko

replies.body:
This is probably a bug, and might be better to post in the [bug report board](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report) instead of here.

They might ask you for how to replicate it, though, and it doesn't seem like you know what happened.

I got the same problem.
Docthorr - EUW
